thread.title: Long Islanders spill on their favorite beers
thread.title_full: Long Islanders spill on their favorite beers | Newsday

author: newsday.com
title: Long Islanders spill on their favorite beers
text:
Karin Denker, Mount Sinai
Favorite beer: Pipeworks Glaucus
Why? "It's not too high in alcohol, it has a fruity taste, a melon balance...well, I just like it, yeah." (Credit: Ian J. Stark)
Long Islanders have a lot of options when they want a beer. Neighborhood pubs are an Island staple and nearby breweries provide locals with unique choices on tap. But what do Long Islanders drink when the barkeeper points their way? As St. Patrick's Day celebrations approach, newsday.com once again sets out to ask....
